ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] How many threads can I witness in one hour?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes. My own half-elf bard has discarded bronze in favor of lesser AC, lighter pieces as well. (A bronze breastplate discarded in favor of the Lockjaw Hide
ygData.messageBody:
>-----Original Message-----
>From: mccomb@... [mailto:mccomb@...]
>Sent: Friday, March 31, 2000 10:14 AM

>obvious he was twinked. Here was this level 10 wood elf bard, dressed
>head to toe in bronze. I gave him the gauntlets, and he very graciously
>gave me his old bronze gauntlets. :) They look nice on Adagia, but I
>think they are too heavy, I'll probably just stick to banded for now.

Yes. My own half-elf bard has discarded bronze in favor of lesser AC,
lighter pieces as well. (A bronze breastplate discarded in favor
of the Lockjaw Hide Vest that a hunting partner handed her, only
2 kills after she first put the bronze BP on.) The gloves and boots
are particularly heinous in terms of weight to AC ratio.
